overview: During his time at Apple, Enda Murphy was responsible for test engineering, hardware design and hardware research and development. He also had management responsibility for a number of key development teams creating multimedia peripherals for Apple’s Macintosh range of products. At Apple, Enda oversaw the creation of the first digital satellite receiver system in Ireland, as well as the design and delivery of the first TV/Teletext/Radio peripheral for Apple’s worldwide suite of products. Enda held the position of Hardware development manager at Netnote International from 1998 to 2003. Enda is a co-founder of Lincor Solutions Ltd and currently holds the position of CTO.
